title: Video: Alt-J – Tessellate
body:
Following the rise and rise of **Alt-J** has been a hugely rewarding process.

From appearing on the scene under two years ago, to the release of their critically acclaimed debut LP **_An Awesome Wave_** earlier this year, their meteoric climb to mainstream success is well underway. Having had forthcoming single _Tessellate_ Radio 1 A listed yesterday, the Leeds four piece have released the accompanying video for the track. Apparently a “twist on Italian Renaissance painter Raphael’s ‘The School of Athens’, set in a modern day gangster’s paradise” it’s slightly bizarre video, directed by **Alex Southam**. Check it out below.
